campaign.title: Google Integration Guide
campaign.subject: Connect Google Business Profile for maximum visibility

slides.title: Google Integration
slides.narration: Your Google Business Profile is how most people find you. But keeping it updated separately is a hassle. Let's connect it so changes sync automatically and you manage everything from one place.

slides.title: What You'll Connect
slides.narration: We'll connect your Google Business Profile for automatic syncing, set up review monitoring so you never miss feedback, enable post publishing to Google from our platform, and integrate analytics to see how Google drives traffic.

slides.title: Step 1: Connect Account

steps: Sign in with Google account that manages your business

slides.narration: First, connect your account. Click Connect Google, sign in with the Google account that manages your business profile, select your business location if you have multiple, grant the requested permissions, and confirm. Takes about sixty seconds.

slides.title: Step 2: Sync Settings
slides.narration: Choose what syncs. Business hours, services and products, photos, posts, Q&A responses. Two-way sync means changes in either place update both. Update once, reflected everywhere.

slides.title: Step 3: Review Alerts
slides.narration: Set up review monitoring. Instant notification when you get a new review. Reminders if you haven't responded within your target time. Alerts when your overall rating changes. Optionally track competitor reviews to see what customers say about them.

slides.title: Step 4: Post Publishing

content.benefit: Posts appear in search results and Maps

slides.narration: Enable Google Posts publishing. Updates, offers, events, and products can all post to Google directly from our platform. These posts appear in Google search results and Maps—more visibility with no extra work.

slides.title: Pro Tips

tips: Post to Google weekly for best visibility
Add photos monthly (businesses with photos get 42% more requests)
Check insights monthly for search term data

slides.narration: Google integration pro tips. Post to Google weekly for best visibility in search. Respond to all reviews within twenty-four hours. Add new photos monthly—businesses with photos get forty-two percent more direction requests. Check Google insights monthly to see what terms people use to find you.

slides.title: Connect Google Now
slides.narration: Ready to sync your Google presence? Connect now and manage everything from one dashboard. Or learn more about maximizing your Google Business Profile first. One connection, automatic updates everywhere.
